idea-plugin.name: Jrag and Jrop
idea-plugin.change-notes: New features are favouring and adding new labels.
idea-plugin.description:
This product adds a new Tool Window that allows users to avoid retyping popular code segments using Drag and Drop code chunks. The Tool Window contains labels that when clicked reveals java code that can be dragged into the main text area. There are multiple categories like Testing, Data Structures, and Favourites where you can star your most used chunks to the same place! New labels and code chunks can also be added to customize functionality to your needs.
